properties.description: D360 Bank is a Saudi Arabia-based private digital bank with 326 employees and 46.8% YoY growth; it secured $439.7M in funding and launched operations in December 2024, attracting 600,000 customers. The bank offers tailored, secure, and transparent banking solutions, emphasizing innovation and shariah compliance to enhance financial experiences.

company.about:
D360 Bank is a shariah-compliant digital bank that aims to provide the best financial experience in the Kingdom.

Our Vision:

To reinvent finance through innovation & technology making it convenient, accessible & fair to all.

evaluations.criterion: Company has engaged in expansion activities (such as opening new branches, entering new markets, or increasing operations) within the last 2 years (2024-2025)
evaluations.reasoning: The internal company profile confirms D360 Bank is a digital bank operating in Saudi Arabia. A recent news article (published February 3 2025) reports that D360 launched its banking operations in December 2024, attracting 600,000 customers and launching AI‑powered financing. Launching operations in a new market (Saudi Arabia) constitutes an expansion activity, and it occurred within the 2024‑2025 window. Therefore the company meets the criterion.

properties.description: Saudi-based private banking institution with 208 employees (+23.6% YoY growth); licensed by the Saudi Central Bank in June 2021; operates in the banking industry; launched new digital banking services in 2025, demonstrating active expansion and innovation.
properties.content:
## The Future of Smart Banking Starts With You

### We bring you carefully designed financial solutions tailored to meet your needs and aspirations, helping you achieve your financial goals effortlessly and enhancing your quality of life.

Create a Murabaha Term Deposit in less than a minute with an amount of only 1,000 SAR Enjoy competitive returns with short to long terms starting from just seven days.

Vision Bank savings account taking just seconds to open and its designed to help you achieve your goals with simple and confident steps.

Choose from a variety of designs to find the card that suits you best, all while maintaining privacy and security.

1. ## Security is Our Priority



We employ the best practices and cutting-edge technologies to deliver reliable banking services.


Item 1 of 4

## FAQs

### Is Vision Bank licensed in Saudi Arabia?

Yes, Vision Bank is licensed in KSA and regulated and supervised by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA).

### Is Vision Bank compliant with Islamic Shariah Principles?

Yes.

### Is Vision Bank a wallet?

No. Vision Bank is a digital bank that will offer a full range of financial solutions.

### When will I have an account with Vision Bank?

Register on the priority list through the Vision Bank website or application. When it is your turn, you will receive an SMS with an invite code to open your account. This code can only be used once.

© 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved.

Closed Joint Stock Company with a Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000, CR No. 1010850478 Licensed in accordance with the Council of Ministers decree No. 672 dated 12/11/1442H corresponding to 22/06/2021G, Subject to the supervision of the Saudi Central Bank, 6537 King Abdulaziz Rd., King Salman Dist. 12432 Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

## © 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved. Closed Joint Stock Company, Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000. Commercial Registration 1010850478, National Address 6537 Riyadh 12432-2693, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

company.name: Vision Bank
company.about:
Vision Bank your lifestyle partner that provides fully secured digital banking services that suits your way of life and accommodate both your personal or enterprise banking needs. 

Vision bank is a Saudi, Sharia compliant bank licensed by the Saudi Central Bank in June of 2021.

evaluations.criterion: Company has engaged in expansion activities (such as opening new branches, entering new markets, or increasing operations) within the last 2 years (2024-2025)
evaluations.reasoning: Vision Bank received a non‑objection from the Saudi Central Bank to launch its digital banking operations in 2025 (Argaam, 15 Sep 2025; ffnews, 2025).  Launching a new digital service is an expansion of operations, and it falls within the 2024‑2025 window.  No other evidence of branch openings or market entries is required, as this activity satisfies the criterion of expansion.

properties.description: Hala is a Saudi Arabian fintech platform licensed by SAMA, with 355 employees, providing SME banking and payment solutions. It is actively expanding into European markets following a $157 million Series B funding round in September 2025, focused on embedded finance and digital banking growth.

## كافة احتياجات عملياتك المالية. منصة واحدة.

حساب الأعمال الذي يعطيك تسوية فورية للمبيعات إلى حسابك، مع قبول وإرسال المدفوعات والتحكم في المصروفات والحصول على التمويل لتنمية منشأتك، وكلّ ذلك من منصة واحدة.

# موثوق من قبل الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة

هلا هي الحل البسيط والموثوق لإدارة الشؤون المالية للشركات الصغيرة في المملكة العربية السعودية. من المدفوعات إلى المشتريات والتمويل، نحن نغطي كل شيء.

#### 100,000 شركة صغيرة ومتوسطة

التجار يستخدمون هلا يوميًا

####  20 مليار

حجم المعاملات المعالجة

#### مرخصة من البنك المركزي السعودي (ساما)

مؤسسة مالية مرخصة بالكامل في السعودية

هلا هي منصة تقنية مالية رائدة تهتم بتمكين المنشآت الصغيرة والمتوسطة من إدارة إيراداتهم .ومدفوعاتهم بطريقة سهلة وآمنة

company.name: Hala
company.about: Hala is a Saudi Arabian fintech platform licensed by SAMA, with 355 employees, providing SME banking and payment solutions. It is actively expanding into European markets following a $157 million Series B funding round in September 2025, focused on embedded finance and digital banking growth.

evaluations.criterion: Company has engaged in expansion activities (such as opening new branches, entering new markets, or increasing operations) within the last 2 years (2024-2025)
evaluations.reasoning: Hala announced a $157 million Series B round in September 2025 that was explicitly aimed at expanding its embedded‑finance and digital‑banking services.  Bloomberg (15 Sep 2025) reports that the company is “preparing to expand into the UK and other European markets,” and Fintech Global (16 Sep 2025) states the funding will “boost embedded finance growth” and expand Hala’s market reach.  These statements describe a clear expansion into new geographic markets and a scale‑up of services, both occurring between 1 Jan 2024 and 23 Nov 2025.  No other evidence contradicts this, and the expansion is not merely routine growth but a strategic move into new regions and product capabilities.

references.title: Saudi Central Bank – SAMA - LinkedIn
references.snippet:
What is SAMA in Saudi Arabia?
The Saudi Central Bank (SAMA) is the Central Bank of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. SAMA was established in 1371H (1952). The objectives of the Bank are as follows: 1- Maintaining monetary stability. 2- Supporting financial sector stability, and promoting confidence in it. 3- Supporting economic growth.

references.title: Saudi Central Bank (SAMA) | AML/CTF Oversight And Regulatory ...
references.snippet:
What is SAMA in banking?
The Saudi Central Bank (SAMA), formerly known as the Saudi Arabian Monetary Authority, is the Kingdom's central financial regulator and the primary authority overseeing anti-money laundering (AML) and counter-terrorist financing (CTF) compliance.
